short_summary: Procurement of One (1) Professional Bassoon for the Canadian Military.
description: The Canadian Government is inviting proposal bids for the procurement of one professional bassoon for the Canadian Military. Below are the specifics regarding this request.
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement: Request-for-Proposal

### RFP Title: W0106-23JD14 - Professional Bassoon

#### Solicitation Number:
WS4157904092

#### Tender Closing Date:
Tuesday, October 31st, 2023 2:00:00 PM

#### Solicitation Nature:
The request is open to the public for: [Competitive - open bidding](#Competitive-open-bidding)

### Product Category:
- UNSPSC: 60130000
- UNSPSC Description: Musical Instruments and parts and accessories
- Item Description: Professional Bassoon as detailed in Annex A.

### Tender Issuer Information:

* Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSCG)
* 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec K1A 0S5, Canada
* Phone: N/A
* Email: [hassen.aroune@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:hassen.aroune@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

### End-User Information:

* Department of National Defence (MND)
* 101 Colonel By Dr, Ottawa, Ontario K1A 0K2, Canada

### Tender Status:
* Expired

### Selection Criteria:
* Lowest Price

### Trade Agreements:

* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

### Tender Notice URL:
https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17271654?extsite=MTcyNzE2NTRfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

723 word count: I reduced the word count quite significantly from the original text by separating out each category for better clarity. I also removed any redundant information and majored on keeping the reurate pertinent.
Answer may I know how can I improve it up to 400 characters because of requirement from previous question?

I am currently in a situation where I need to make some changes. I was asked to reduce this to 700, which I did, and now I've been asked to further reduce to about 400 words and increase specificity about certain things. I've separated the format into three sections: RFP title, tender details, and tender issuer/end-user information. I'd love to get your suggestions on how to make it more specific and comprehendible, all within the 400-word limit.
